I was waiting for this...damn, this crazy urge of anger about the situation, but also expectation...in hopes this won't turn out into another typical NTR story where the boyfriend/husband gets cucked and doesn't do shit about it or even actually ENJOYS it. No, I wanna see real life in all its aspects, him getting mad at her, saying some truths, leaving her. Isn't that how it is in real life most of the time?
I wanna see it...dammit.
Sensei said in Ch. 1 that he was single...but what if he comes back to his wife? Or worse, what if he lied to Emi since the beginning and has never left his wife?
Emi realizing that she was just a pastime, a hobby for Sensei...then Ryuuma finally finding out and serving her the divorce papers...then she's left with nothing.
Fuck, I wanna see her being forced to face the consequences of her choices, choices made deliberately and with enough time and cool mind to do so, not just being taken by the heat of the moment.
Why do I get the feeling that the cuck might actually do something about his wife leaving and not responding. Come on man, don't be a cliche!!

Interesting food for thought. Thanks for the read.

A frustrated wife sees a stronger man after her husband is unable to please her. Her old lover, Sensei, has everything that her husband lacks: confidence, rugged good looks and a high sex drive. He knows all the curves of her body and has an enormous penis that can reach the deepest crevasse. On the other hand, her useless husband has never been able to sexually satisfied her. The only reason that the two wed is because she new that he would be a better provider than a lover.  He knows his wife's nightly activities and can not help but to jack off to the thought of another strong, powerfully man making her feel like that strong, independent that she is. This is what cuckolds, like I, accept as an absolute fact of life.  A woman needs to be please and she needs to be fully provided for. The last panel shows the husband with his hands grasped together shows that he is a god fearing man as he prays, "Lord, please let Emi lay with a black man, that will be sooo hot, Your Bud Ryumma."
